result.execSummary:
Kyla M Turner was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Kyla M Turner was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Email from Jail advising Defendant was extradited.
Review hearing on August 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.

09:16 AM Defendant Kyla M Turner in court with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State advises the defendant is scheduled for transport the week of 8/1/22 and requests a review hearing on 8/8/22.
Defense requests a habeas corpus hearing and a sooner date than 8/8/22.
Court notes there is no bail set and orders any bail revoked to make it clear the defendant is ready to be picked up.
Court will schedule a review hearing at the end of the week defendant is scheduled for transport to ensure she has been picked up.  
Defendant to remain in custody pending transport or a further order from this Court.
Review hearing scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Review hearing on July 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:52 AM Defendant Kyla M Turner in court, in custody, with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.   Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Governors warrant has been received and filed.
Court revokes any bail that may have been set.
Parties request a review hearing in 2 weeks to check on the defendant's status.  Review hearing scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Governor's warrant with attachments from Indiana, signed by Governor Tony Evers on June 30, 2022.
Review hearing on July 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

04:19 PM Defendant Kyla M Turner in court, in custody, with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.   Alyssa M Jay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense notes the governor's warrant has not been filed yet.
State advises they have confirmation that the paperwork was signed in Indiana and are waiting for it to arrive in the office.
State requests a review hearing on 7/7/22 as that is the last day within the time limits.
Defense has no objection.  Review hearing scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Review hearing on June 20, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

11:20 AM Defendant Kyla M Turner in court, in custody, with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.   Peter Michael Tempelis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Parties are still waiting for the Governor's warrant.
State advises we are waiting for our governor's office to process the warrant.
  Review hearing scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Review hearing on June 6, 2022 at 11:00 am.

09:56 AM Defendant Kyla M Turner in court, in custody, with attorney Steven Hughes for Luis Daniel Gutierrez.   Andrew Nesheim appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
State requests a 60 day extension on the Governor's warrant.
Defense objects to the extension and moves to dismiss this matter.  In the alternative, Defense reqeusts bail be set in this matter.
Court denies the motion to dismiss this matter and grants the motion for extension of time to file the Governor's warrant.
Court addresses the issue of bail.
Arguments by the Defense.  Arguments by the State.
For the reasons stated on the record the Court declines to set bail.  Defendant to remain in custody without bail.  Review hearing scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Notice of Probation Violation from Marion County Superior Court
Review hearing on May 9, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:22 AM Defendant Kyla M Turner in court, in custody, with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.   Andrew Nesheim appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense requests to address bail.
Arguments by the Defense.
Court denies requests for bail at this time.
Court signs warrant for commitment.
Defense requests the 30 day timeframe start as of 4/10/22 when the defendant was placed in custody.  Court grants request and will set a review hearing.
  Review hearing scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Warrant for Commitmentsigned by Judge Michael O. Bohren on 4/20/22
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.

records.addlTxt: Filed by Attorney  Luis Daniel Gutierrez
Hearing on April 20, 2022 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Kyla M Turner
Current: 515 W Moreland Blvd, c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States  (Effective: 04-11-2022)
Prior: 4365 N. 25th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209 United States

03:31 PM Defendant Kyla M Turner in court, in custody, with attorney Justin G Griffis.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Griffis appears as friend of the court.  Defendant is not eligible for State Public Defender representation.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint, affidavit and warrant for commitment and waives reading of complaint, affidavit and warrant for commitment.  Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  The defendant is going to contest the extradition.  The State is asking for the defendant to be held without bail.  The Court will deny bail and remand the defendant to the Waukesha County Jail.  The Court will set this matter before the Trial Court as soon as possible for a contested extradition.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Hearing scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 09:30 am.
